common-statement-copy-error-message: An error occurred while copying the statement.
statement-landing-main-text-label: A structured statement is used for the automatic processing of payments. The statement consists of three groups of digits, separated by slashes. The first group has three digits, the second four, and the third five. The statement starts and ends with three plus signs (+++).
create-statement-main-message: Begin entering a number up to 10 digits long. The last two digits, which are known as the check digits, will be calculated automatically by our system.
generate-statement-main-message: The structured statement shown below is generated automatically by our system, which uses a randomly selected combination of digits to ensure uniqueness and accuracy.
verify-statement-main-message: Start typing your structured statement. Our tool automatically checks its validity, a green background indicates that the input is valid.
mobile-landing-text-part-two: Thank you for visiting our website. Unfortunately, our tool is not yet available on mobile devices. We kindly request you to switch to a desktop device for the best user experience.
